text: And if he see the leprosy in his skin, and the hair turned white, and the place where the leprosy appears lower than the skin and the rest of the flesh, it is the stroke of the leprosy, and upon his judgment he shall be separated."

segments.text: And if he see the leprosy in his skin, and the hair turned white, and the place where
the leprosy appears lower than the skin and the rest of the flesh, it is the stroke of
the leprosy, and upon his judgment he shall be separated."
